sentences.en: Each apple was individually wrapped in paper.
sentences.cn: 每个苹果都用纸单独包着.

sentences.en: Each family farms individually and reaps the benefit of its labor.
sentences.cn: 各家经营各自的农场，收获各自的劳动成果。

sentences.en: Each line must contain several hundred individually identifiable halftone light values.
sentences.cn: 每一条线必须包括几百个各自认得出的用网屏表示的光度值.

sentences.en: Each of the ten bedrooms is individually furnished.
sentences.cn: 十个卧室都配有各自的家具.

sentences.en: Every part is individually checked before assembly.
sentences.cn: 在装配前,部件要逐个检查.
独立包装的一份份干酪

sentences.en: Ted hated parties, even gatherings of people he liked individually.
sentences.cn: 特德讨厌各种派对，即便是他自己喜欢的人的聚会也不例外。

sentences.en: The bridegroom thanked them all individually.
The chocolates are individually wrapped in gold foil.
sentences.cn: 巧克力用金箔纸一颗颗独立包装。

sentences.en: The manager spoke to them all individually.
sentences.cn: 经理逐一和他们各人谈话。

sentences.en: The rational and the irrational complement each other. Individually, they are far less powerful.
sentences.cn: 理性和非理性是互补的。两者分开的话，力量就会小很多。

sentences.en: The related publications are far too numerous to list individually.
sentences.cn: 相关出版物太多,没法一一列举.

sentences.en: There are 76 individually furnished bedrooms, all with private bathrooms.
sentences.cn: 这里有76间陈设各异的卧室，都配有独立卫生间。

sentences.en: There are 96 pieces and they are worth, individually and collectively, a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 共有96件，它们无论单独一件还是放在一起，都值很多钱。

sentences.en: These assumptions are difficult to test individually to great precision.
sentences.cn: 这些假设很难非常精确地逐个加以检验.

sentences.en: We'd better go in a group, not individually.
sentences.cn: 最好集体去, 不要单个儿去.

words.tran_cn: 个人的；有个性的；具有个人特色的
个人主义；利己主义；个人特征
利己主义者，个人主义者
使…个性化；分别详述（individualize的过去分词）
赋予个性；个别处理；使适应个别需要
个别化；表现区别；一一列举；赋予个性；使个体化

trans.tran_cn: 分别地，各个地，各自地，独特地
trans.tran_en: separately, not together in a group
